attributes.action: reduce fuel VAT to help us all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like mnany others would like the fuel VAT reduced as it is killing this country. So are many other things like imigration and social security paid to those who have not paid into it.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+fuel+vat&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=reduce+fuel&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
